verbose_text: Interestingly, injection of 5 ng/g recombinant FGF2 into CPE-NFalpha1-KO mouse for 30 consecutive days completely reversed the decreased number of doublecortin positive neurons in the subgranular zone of hippocampus and depressive like behaviors as evidenced by decreased immobility time in the forced-swim test.
evidence: FGF2 into CPE-NFalpha1-KO mouse for 30 consecutive days completely reversed the decreased number of doublecortin
